description.en-US:
Either:
one or more <glyphRef> elements, or
one or more <altGlyphItem> elements
description.fr:
L'un ou l'autre:
un éléments ou plus <glyphRef>, ou
un éléments ou plus <altGlyphItem>
description.pt-BR:
Ambos:
um ou mais elementos <glyphRef>, ou
um ou mais elementos <altGlyphItem>
description.zh-CN:
两者之一：
一个或多个<glyphRef>元素，或者一个或多个<altGlyphItem>元素

description.en-US: One or more <glyphRef> elements
description.fr: un éléments ou plus <glyphRef>
description.pt-BR: Um ou mais elementos <glyphRef>
description.zh-CN: 一个或多个<glyphRef>元素

description.en-US: Any number of descriptive elements and exactly one light source element, in any order.
description.zh-CN: 任意数量的描述性元素以及不多不少一个光源元素，顺序不限。

description.en-US: Exactly one light source element first and any number of descriptive elements in any order.
description.zh-CN: 有且只有一个光源元素在先，任意数量的描述性元素顺序不限。

description.en-US: Any number of descriptive elements » and at most one <font-face> element, in any order.
One or more of the following elements, in any order:
description.zh-CN: 一个或多个下列元素，顺序不限：
